text: Up to the Moment is the first compilation album by Australian rock band Mondo Rock, released in June 1985 through Polydor Records. It peaked at number 8 on the Kent Music Report. == Track listing == ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"| Chart (1985) !scope="col"| Position |- !scope="row"| Australian Kent Music Report. | style="text-align:center;"| 8 |- |} == References == Category:1985 compilation albums Category:Mondo Rock albums Category:Albums produced by Ross Wilson Category:Compilation albums by Australian artists Category:PolyGram compilation albums Category:Polydor Records compilation albums Category:Albums produced by John L Sayers
title: Up to the Moment
